:Windlord:

Windlord moved towards scrat and ask him glently "Are you ok ?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Scrat::
> 
> Scrat tried to run off again as he hears Windlord's voice, but 
trips 
> over a root and falls, a small yelp issuing from him as he hits his 
> hand. He curles up into a little ball (in robot mode), trembling 
> uncontrollably.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > :; Windlord ::
> > 
> > "it just an small and afraid squirrel " Windlord said inside his 
> mind 
> > and said a loud but trying don't seem a menace " Come here... I 
> won't 
> > hurt you... "
